articles.title: Mortgage rates rise above 4% for the first time since 2019 - CNN
articles.description: Mortgage rates climbed past 4% for the first time since May 2019. The 30-year fixed-rate mortgage averaged 4.16% in the week ending March 17, up from 3.85% the week before, according to Freddie Mac.
